(Simplified: 穑)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 嗇 indicates the sound; 禾 (grain) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 禾 [ hé ] cereal, grain, rice; plant, stalk
    • 嗇 [ sè ] miserly, stingy, thrifty
①收割穀物，亦泛指耕作：穡人。穡夫。穡地。穡事(泛指耕作事宜)。稼穡。
(Simplified: 穑)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 嗇 indicates the sound; 禾 (grain) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 穑

Related Character(s): 嗇
Связанный символ (и): 嗇

Main pronunciation 主要发音: sè

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning farm.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 穑夫 sè fū (farmer)

Importance by frequency 常用频率:

Shuowen 说文解字: 榖可收曰穡從禾嗇聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 穡 from grain 禾 hé and phonetic building-silo (啬)嗇 sè simp 穑. (double-talk (啬)嗇 sè 牆 qiáng)

穡字的基本解释

穡
sè
见“穑”。

穡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sè］
［《廣韻》所力切，入職，生。］
亦作“穯1”。“穑1”的繁体字。
(1)收获谷物。
(2)泛指耕耘收种。
(3)谷类植物的穗。
(4)钩连。
(5)通“”。悲哀。
(6)通“嗇”。节俭；爱惜。

穡字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　穡； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页860第42
【唐韻】所力切【集韻】【韻會】殺測切，?音色。【說文】穀可收曰穡。【書·盤庚】若農服田力穡，乃亦有秋。【疏】種之曰稼，斂之曰穡，穡是秋收之名。又【洪範疏】穡，惜也。言聚蓄之可惜也。　亦通作嗇。【禮·郊特牲】主先嗇而祭司嗇。【註】先嗇若神農，司嗇后稷是也。　又愛吝也。【左傳·僖二十一年】臧文仲曰：務穡勸分。【註】穡，儉也。【疏】穡是愛惜之義，故爲儉。又【昭元年】穆叔曰：大國省穡而用之。【註】穡，愛也。

gather in harvest
Basic explanation of words
gather in harvest
sè
See "穑".
gather in harvest
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sè]
["Guangyun" force cut, entry, birth. ]
Also known as "穯1". Traditional characters for "穑1".
(1) Harvesting cereals.
(2) Generally refers to tilling and harvesting.
(3) Ears of cereal plants.
(4) Hook connection.
(5) Pass "". sorrow.
(6) Through "啬". Thrift; cherish.
gather in harvest
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [He Zi Department] 　穑; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 860 42
[Tang Yun] force to cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] to test and cut,? Tone. [Speaking text] Gu Ke received and said 穑. 【Shu·Pangeng】If the farm wears the field, there will be autumn. [Sparse] Planting is called crops, and condensing is called 穑, which is the name of autumn harvest. Also 【Hong Fanshu】Chu, cherish it. It's a pity to accumulate words.　It's also good. 【Ritual·Special Sacrifice】The Lord sips first and the priest sips. [Note] First, if Shennong, Sishou Huji.　I am also stingy. [Twenty-one Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xi] Zang Wenzhong said: Wu Sheng persuades points. [Note] Zhen, frugal. 【Sparse】Chu is the righteousness of love and cherishment, so it is thrifty. Also [Zhaoyuan Year] Uncle Mu said: The great powers use it for the province. 【Note】Hua, love too.
